verses.text: “\w These|strong="H7760"\w* \w are|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w* \w that|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*:

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w* \w without|strong="H2600"\w* \w paying|strong="H2600"\w* anything.

\w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w master|strong="H5414"\w* \w gives|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w bears|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w woman|strong="H1323"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w belong|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w master|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* only \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w free|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* declares, ‘\w I|strong="H5650"\w* love \w my|strong="H3318"\w* master \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3318"\w* wife \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*; \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w want|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w*,’

\w then|strong="H5066"\w* \w his|strong="H5647"\w* master is \w to|strong="H5066"\w* \w bring|strong="H5066"\w* \w him|strong="H5647"\w* before \w the|strong="H5647"\w* judges.\f + \fr 21:6 \ft Or before God\f* \w And|strong="H5769"\w* he shall take \w him|strong="H5647"\w* \w to|strong="H5066"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w door|strong="H1817"\w* \w or|strong="H1817"\w* \w doorpost|strong="H4201"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w pierce|strong="H7527"\w* \w his|strong="H5647"\w* \w ear|strong="H5647"\w* \w with|strong="H5647"\w* \w an|strong="H5066"\w* \w awl|strong="H4836"\w*. \w Then|strong="H5066"\w* he shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w his|strong="H5647"\w* master \w for|strong="H5647"\w* life.

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w sells|strong="H4376"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H5650"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w free|strong="H3318"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w menservants|strong="H5650"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w*.

If \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H7451"\w* \w displeasing|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w her|strong="H6299"\w* \w master|strong="H4910"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w had|strong="H5869"\w* \w designated|strong="H3259"\w* \w her|strong="H6299"\w* \w for|strong="H7451"\w* \w himself|strong="H3808"\w*,\f + \fr 21:8 \ft Or so that he does not designate her for himself\f* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* allow \w her|strong="H6299"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w*. \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H5869"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w right|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w her|strong="H6299"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H5237"\w*, since \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H5869"\w* broken faith \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w her|strong="H6299"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* chooses \w her|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*.

If \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w takes|strong="H3947"\w* \w another|strong="H3808"\w* wife, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3947"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w reduce|strong="H1639"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w food|strong="H7607"\w*, \w clothing|strong="H3682"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* marital \w rights|strong="H5772"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* first wife.

If, however, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w provide|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w things|strong="H7969"\w*, \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3701"\w* \w free|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* monetary \w payment|strong="H2600"\w*. Personal Injury Laws

\w Whoever|strong="H4191"\w* \w strikes|strong="H5221"\w* \w and|strong="H4191"\w* \w kills|strong="H5221"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w If|strong="H7760"\w*, however, \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lie|strong="H6658"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w wait|strong="H6658"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* allowed \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* happen, \w then|strong="H7760"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w appoint|strong="H7760"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w*.

Anyone who \w curses|strong="H7043"\w* \f + \fr 21:17 \ft Or dishonors or reviles\f* \w his|strong="H7043"\w* father \w or|strong="H4191"\w* mother \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 21:17 \ft Cited in Matthew 15:4 and Mark 7:10\f*

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H1167"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w fighting|strong="H5327"\w* \w strike|strong="H5062"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pregnant|strong="H2030"\w* \w woman|strong="H2030"\w* \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w born|strong="H3318"\w* \w prematurely|strong="H3318"\w*,\f + \fr 21:22 \ft Or she has a miscarriage\f* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* further \w injury|strong="H5414"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w fined|strong="H6064"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w woman|strong="H2030"\w*’s \w husband|strong="H1167"\w* \w demands|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w court|strong="H3318"\w* allows.
